articles.author: Thomas Whitehead
articles.title: Switch Vs. PS5 And Xbox - Nintendo Preps For The Holidays With A New SKU And European Price Cut - Nintendo Life
articles.description: The battle for Holiday sales is about to begin
articles.content: Nintendo can't be accused of being reactive with the Switch ahead of the fast approaching Holiday season. In a time where sales and demand remain strong, the big N has been lining up a steady flow of… [+7850 chars]
